pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geographical Detectors // Geographical detectors for measuring spatial stratified heterogeneity, as described in Jinfeng Wang (2010) doi:10.1080/13658810802443457 and Jinfeng Wang (2016) doi:10.1016/j.ecolind.2016.02.052. Includes the discretization of continuous data and four primary functions of geographical detectors.
